name: Digital Streamers
description:
Digital Streamers is a multi-platform entertainment company that develops, produces and distributes original entertainment programming. DS manages a leading network of Facebookers & Youtubers with over 100 channels delivering more than 80 million views a week. 

DS boasts an unparalleled track record for delivering highly successful branded content initiatives for top UK Brands.

team.title: Sales Manager
team.name: Leslie Poku
team.bioHtml: Currently an influencer marketer at Digital Streamers. Digital Marketing Executive, worked with ACCA, Instinctif Partners, Aviva, Dream Nation, BRKV, and more.

team.title: Head of Talent
team.name: Raquel Mendes
team.bioHtml: Creator of Luxurious Skin blog and Raquel Mendes YouTube channel. Skincare and makeup guru. Content writing lover and social media enthusiast.

jobs.title: Social Media Manager – UK
jobs.description:
We’re on the hunt for a Social Media Manager to join the DIGITAL STREAMERS team in our London office - Oxford Street!

Here are the details:

As part of a young, dynamic social media agency with offices London, we develop new formats, create content and operate different online platforms and channels.

Further parts of the social media agency, we also work on apps, organise events and manage Influencers as well as young talents.

At the moment we are on the lookout for a very engaged and motivated Social Media Manager for our team in London!

Your tasks with include:

Develop coherent social media strategies and campaigns for brands
Put together publishing plans and help us to execute social media activities
Creation, supervision and strategic development of our social media accounts
Community management, analysis and performance reportings
Coordinate projects with partners, brands and agencies – your ideas and stories will be seen by an audience of over 205 million

jobs.title: Senior Sales Director (Brands & Agencies)
jobs.description:
Digital Streamers is seeking a motivated Senior Sales Director ready to make a difference in digital marketing. Entrepreneurially-spirited, this salesperson will be responsible for driving direct revenue by leveraging the industry’s leading content recommendations solutions for brands and advertising agencies in the UK. Our team is made up of individuals who are resourceful, bright, and proactive, and who work well both independently and as part of a fast-growing team.

Deliverables:

For this position we are committed to finding a consultative dealmaker with the ability to manage existing accounts, source new clients and build a revenue pipeline, turning prospects into partners.


Your first year should look like this:

-In your first two weeks, you should find your bearings, do a deep dive into the Digital Streamers product, and start to build key internal and external relationships

-After three months, you will be an expert in content marketing and you’ll have mastered our positioning within the digital landscape. You’ll be able to confidently and effectively deliver our pitch, will have already completed a number of in person client meetings and you’ll have a ton of new in person meetings scheduled.

-After six months, you will have successfully closed an abundance of new brand and agency business as well have significantly grown a number of key existing accounts

-When you finish up your first year, you’ll be an essential part of the UK sales team, having substantially increased Digital Streamers market penetration with the key brand and agencies within the region.

 

What you’ll need to be successful:

-You’re not a fan of display ads, and are passionate about educating brands on a more effective way to engage with their target audience online with content marketing

-You read up on digital marketing in your downtime, and know the landscape like the back of your hand (or something you know really, really well)

-You understand how to think consultatively, and can sell our multiple solutions without confusing the overall product messaging

-You are not satisfied unless you are actively hunting and closing new business

-You’re flexible, and don’t mind hopping on a plane for a last minute meeting or conference

-Excel doesn’t make you sweat- analyzing campaign analytics and metrics will come naturally  

-You know the birthdays and favorite colors of contacts at the top brands, agencies and publishers in the UK market.

jobs.title: Influencer Talent Coordinator
jobs.description:
We are recruiting for a Talent Coordinator to work in our London office with the worlds top digital first talent and on social media campaigns.

We are looking for someone who has existing experience in a similar role. This individual will be able to liaise between Talent, Clients/Agencies on various projects, managing multiple stakeholders simultaneously.
 
We are a small, ambitious team looking for an enthusiastic and positive person who possesses the following skills:
 
• Experience in PR/social media/Talent Management is a PLUS.

• Responsibilities will include; assisting the Talent Manager with Social Talent projects, updating and managing platforms and talent databases, travel and diary management, building profile/PR/Marketing, managing talent inboxes and PO boxes and ad hoc office administration.

• Must share a clear vision for role of social media for brands, businesses and social talent.

• Must be client service orientated and be able to produce reports and presentations to a high standard.
• Must have strong MS-Office skills.
• Must have great attention to detail, be extremely well organised and have the ability to manage multiple projects / talent simultaneously.
• Must have excellent verbal, written communication and collaboration skills.
• Be willing to go the extra mile, always.

jobs.title: Talent Management - YouTube Influencers
jobs.description:
Digital Streamers seeks a highly motivated, strategic, outgoing, and knowledgeable Talent Manager to further develop the company’s relationships with brand and agency partners.

Sample Duties:

• Establish and grow productive and meaningful relationships with the top UK digital creators and their management

• Partner with strategic creators on a number of initiaitives ranging from channel and audience growth, production assistance, monetization growth, merchandising and licensing opportunities and extensions into digital brands and businesses

• Clearly and accurately segment UK creators into defined sectors and apply varying combinations of our services as needed – carefully managing studio and production resource, sales capabilities and business acumen

• Lead and inspire a growing team of talent managers and focus creative and fun work into operational and financial excellence

Essential Experience & Qualifications:
• Intelligence: You have a unique awareness of the Youtube landscape and have the ability to obtain a Youtube certification within your first 6 months with the company

• Personality: You are incredibly outgoing; people are generally drawn towards you

• Organization: You must have strong written and oral communication skills

• BA/BS degree from a top-tier university

• BA/BS degree from a top-tier university

jobs.title: Influencer Marketing Manager - Brands
jobs.description:
DS seeks a Influencer Marketing Manager to be responsible for strategic selling across both agencies, holding companies and brands. This means being able to represent DS and our point of difference in a compelling manner, and offering compelling solutions grounded in a client’s business challenge. Beyond being someone who enjoys the process of upselling, the manager will oversee the execution of all that is sold, ensuring clients get what they pay for. The net effect is we should be our clients’ most valued media partner, trusted for delivering exceptional content and results.

Sample Duties:

• Sell new engagements; manage clients

• Proactively anticipate and diligently follow through sales and client engagements

• Ensure we always represent DS well with a polished, strategic, and thoughtful approach
• Understand and interpret client feedback
• Build and maintain healthy client-agency relationships
• Keep abreast of trends and changes – intellectually curious
• Create transparency and discussion around what we are doing for the client, the health of the relationship, and identify where there are opportunities to extend our relationships
• Oversee a brand manager who will be executing day to day

Essential Experience & Qualifications:
• 2+ years’ experience
• Proven ability to upsell clients – to create compelling recommendations
• Is both strategic and tactical
• Has experience in both new business and client work (delivery, management)
• Client relationship expert and someone who is effective at building new client relationships
• Strong interpersonal and communication skills
• Highly organized and detail-oriented
• Intellectually curious

jobs.title: EVENT PROGRAMME COORDINATOR - BEAUTY EVENT
jobs.description:
Digital Streamers are looking for an event organisers to join their team. 
We are preparing a very large Beauty Event; with household names as sponsors. We are looking for a confident and competent person to organise and manage events.


The role:


Organising and running events from initial customer contact right through to the end of the event
The first and main contact for all event enquiries
Provide profitable party packages for all types of events
Responsible for increasing sales by promoting the party spaces we can offer
Liaising with all on site managers to talent/influencers 
Liaising with directors on a weekly basis to report sales/upcoming events/promotions
Occasional social media updates
The candidate must have:


Strong organisational skills – giving the customer total confidence
Strong communication skills – be able to liaise with the customer through clear and concise emails, phone calls and meetings
At least one year experience of event organising in a similar environment
An enthusiastic, energetic and friendly personality, with a passion for providing excellent customer service
Good influencer/social media & beauty & fashion knowledge and ideally be aware of current beauty & fashion trends

jobs.title: Influencer Markerting Manager
jobs.description:
We’re on the hunt for a Influencer Marketing Manager to join the DIGITAL STREAMERS team in our London office - in Kings Cross!



A day in the life of an Influencer Strategist



As our Influencer Strategist you’ll own and optimise our database of influencers, ensuring the teams have easy access to information on all the influencers we work with, from fashion and lifestyle to beauty. Working closely with our Account Management team, you’ll get the chance working with global brands & high profile influencers.



As part of a young, dynamic media agency with offices London, we develop new formats, create content and operate different online platforms and channels.

Further parts of the media agency, we organise events and manage Influencers as well as young talents.



Your tasks with include:



Develop coherent social media strategies and campaigns for brands 

Put together publishing plans and help us to execute influnecer activities 

Creation, supervision and strategic development of our influencer accounts 

Community management, analysis and performance reportings 

Coordinate projects with partners, brands and agencies – your ideas and stories will be seen by an audience of over 205 million



Brand & Account Management 



Sourcing and managing the influencer outreach to expand the DS database
Creating pitch decks for influencers and clients
Develop their strategy for clients
Plan and manage events
Managing initial inbound enquiries from influencers and/or brands


Reporting, Budgets & Measurement



You will ensure that everything we delivers aims to have a positive business impact and be responsible for evaluating ROI, as well as tracking the development of key brand metrics.
You will work on budgets across PR, Production, Partnerships and Content, and be responsible for monitoring these on a regular basis, to ensure they are on track


Responsibilities

﻿

Own and optimise all information of our network of influencers
Gather data, including influencer specialisms, prices, audience, contact and management information
Use data to create proactive shortlists of influencers, easy for our Account Managers to access
Hold and manage all information on influencer contracts and agreements
Help DS to build a community of influencers through relationship-building events and networking opportunities


Requirements



You’re amazing at:

Being proactive — you’ll be a self-starter who can juggle several tasks at once
Organisation — you’ll be in a fast-paced environment and you can handle pressure
Analysing data - you’ll have a head for numbers and process information in a logical way
Spreadsheets and systems - tech-savvy and know your way around a spreadsheet & creation eye-catching powepoints
All things social — you’re up to speed with the world of influencer marketing and ahead of industry trends

jobs.title: Personal Assistant to CEO
jobs.description:
Digital Streamers is seeking an individual to work as a PA to the Managing Director. We need an individual who is capable of competently dealing with situations in the director’s absence and is confident enough to delegate upwards on the director’s behalf. Maintaining confidentiality is a fundamental requirement of this role. It requires building a strategic partnership with the Managing Director and keep abreast of the organisations goals and the MD’s strategic objectives.


We are looking for an individual with advanced-level skills in Word for Mac and Microsoft PowerPoint and at least an intermediate level knowledge of Microsoft Excel. The attributes of the individual should include the following:


- efficient


- discretion


- flexible


- self-motivated


- organised


- proactive


- a good communicator


The PA’s positions demand competence and skill at performing the following duties:


- reading, monitoring and responding to emails,


- answering calls and liaising with clients competently,


- preparing correspondence on your ceo's behalf,

- delegating work in your ceo's absence,


- diary management,


- planning and organising meetings,


- taking action points and writing minutes,


- taking dictation,


- planning and organising events,


- drafting communications on your ceo's behalf,


- preparing presentations,


- managing and reviewing filing and office systems,


- typing documents, – sourcing and ordering stationery and office equipment, 

The above list is not exhaustive – the scope of the Personal Assistant role can be wide and varied.
